They are using advantage scope probably with advantagekit. These tools are a bit advanced. You can try them for the offseason.

The bottom image is just a screenshot from the Limelight web UI. It is not a simulation, just a visualization of what the camera is seeing.

Advantage scope is a renderer for Network tables. Ascope is a really useful and fairly intuitive tool.
Advantage kit is more complicated

","post_number":5,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2025-03-24T19:04:44.491Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":224,"readers_count":223,"score":74.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":496759,"topic_slug":"simulation-app","display_username":"Val","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":64968,"username":"DukeEmree","name":"Emre ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/dukeemree/{size}/251833_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":2}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":63596,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Programming"},"post_url":"/t/simulation-app/496759/5","custom_user_title":"Programming","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":1},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":2,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3567242,"name":"Andrew Todd","username":"Andrew123ast","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andrew123ast/{size}/243883_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-24T19:05:50.413Z","cooked":"

We started using Advantage Scope and Advantage Kit this season. It‚Äôs a huge improvement. I will never not use Advantage Scope ever again.

Our auto alignment code would not have been possible without the simulation.

","post_number":6,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2025-03-24T19:05:50.413Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":211,"readers_count":210,"score":152.2,"yours":false,"topic_id":496759,"topic_slug":"simulation-app","display_username":"Andrew Todd","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":64968,"username":"DukeEmree","name":"Emre ","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/dukeemree/{size}/251833_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":7}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":71098,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Alumni | Programming Mentor"},"post_url":"/t/simulation-app/496759/6","custom_user_title":"Alumni | Programming Mentor","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":7}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":7,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3567251,"name":"","username":"ThatChair","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/thatchair/{size}/199567_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-24T19:11:25.517Z","cooked":"

image915√ó486 58.3 KB

It can be found on the ‚ÄòAdvanced‚Äô tab of the webUi, which can be accessed using the Limelight Hardware Manager. To see the field, you need to select ‚ÄúRobot pose in field space‚Äù under ‚ÄúVisualizer Setup‚Äù. A more detailed explanation of connecting to the web interface can be found here.

","post_number":7,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2025-03-24T19:11:25.517Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":4,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":199,"readers_count":198,"score":54.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":496759,"topic_slug":"simulation-app","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://docs.limelightvision.io/docs/docs-limelight/getting-started/limelight-4#3-accessing-the-web-interface","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Limelight 4 Quick-Start | Limelight Documentation","clicks":2}],"read":true,"user_title":"","reply_to_user":{"id":74317,"username":"FRC_Member_apex","name":"Ertu","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/f/e480ec/{size}.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":60372,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"2471 Software co-lead"},"post_url":"/t/simulation-app/496759/7","custom_user_title":"2471 Software co-lead","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3567255,"name":"Emre ","username":"DukeEmree","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/dukeemree/{size}/251833_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-24T19:15:38.635Z","cooked":"

We used advantage scope and advantage kit this season. It really made things easier for us, especially since we had very limited time to actually test the robot‚Äôs code. But newbies say it will be too complicated and they won‚Äôt do it in the future .

","post_number":8,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2025-03-24T19:15:38.635Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":6,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":0,"reads":184,"readers_count":183,"score":36.8,"yours":false,"topic_id":496759,"topic_slug":"simulation-app","display_username":"Emre ","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":null,"reply_to_user":{"id":71098,"username":"Andrew123ast","name":"Andrew Todd","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/andrew123ast/{size}/243883_2.png"},"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":64968,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"Programmer"},"post_url":"/t/simulation-app/496759/8","custom_user_title":"Programmer","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3567265,"name":"Dan Katzuv","username":"dan","avatar_template":"/letter_avatar_proxy/v4/letter/d/eada6e/{size}.png","created_at":"2025-03-24T19:25:33.930Z","cooked":"
DukeEmree:

advantagekit

Just note that AdvantageKit is not required to visualize your robot on AdvantageScope.

","post_number":9,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2025-03-24T19:25:33.930Z","reply_count":0,"reply_to_post_number":2,"quote_count":1,"incoming_link_count":5,"reads":167,"readers_count":166,"score":118.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":496759,"topic_slug":"simulation-app","display_username":"Dan Katzuv","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"read":true,"user_title":"","bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[{"id":2,"count":4}],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":32004,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±"},"post_url":"/t/simulation-app/496759/9","custom_user_title":"5987 Software Mentor üáÆüá±","reactions":[{"id":"heart","type":"emoji","count":3},{"id":"point_up","type":"emoji","count":1}],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":4,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3567340,"name":"","username":"ninjadrknss","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/ninjadrknss/{size}/247388_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-24T20:41:26.678Z","cooked":"

For drivetrain sims, the CTRE swerve has a built in one, or you can go more advanced and use Maplesim (*Assuming swerve for both). You then pipe the calculated poses into network tables, then pull them into advantage scope to visualize. You can then run the code in simulation through the wpilib plugin in vscode (Introduction to Robot Simulation ‚Äî FIRST Robotics Competition documentation).

You can also simulate vision using photonvision as well.

","post_number":10,"post_type":1,"posts_count":14,"updated_at":"2025-03-24T20:41:26.678Z","reply_count":1,"reply_to_post_number":null,"quote_count":0,"incoming_link_count":2,"reads":152,"readers_count":151,"score":45.4,"yours":false,"topic_id":496759,"topic_slug":"simulation-app","display_username":"","primary_group_name":null,"flair_name":null,"flair_url":null,"flair_bg_color":null,"flair_color":null,"flair_group_id":null,"badges_granted":[],"version":1,"can_edit":false,"can_delete":false,"can_recover":false,"can_see_hidden_post":true,"can_wiki":false,"link_counts":[{"url":"https://shenzhen-robotics-alliance.github.io/maple-sim/","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"MapleSim","clicks":10},{"url":"https://docs.photonvision.org/en/latest/docs/simulation/index.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Simulation - PhotonVision Docs","clicks":5},{"url":"https://docs.wpilib.org/en/stable/docs/software/wpilib-tools/robot-simulation/introduction.html","internal":false,"reflection":false,"title":"Introduction to Robot Simulation ‚Äî FIRST Robotics Competition documentation","clicks":2}],"read":true,"user_title":null,"bookmarked":false,"actions_summary":[],"moderator":false,"admin":false,"staff":false,"user_id":57180,"hidden":false,"trust_level":2,"deleted_at":null,"user_deleted":false,"edit_reason":null,"can_view_edit_history":true,"wiki":false,"user_custom_fields":{"user_field_4":"751"},"post_url":"/t/simulation-app/496759/10","custom_user_title":"751","reactions":[],"current_user_reaction":null,"reaction_users_count":0,"current_user_used_main_reaction":false,"can_accept_answer":false,"can_unaccept_answer":false,"accepted_answer":false,"topic_accepted_answer":null},{"id":3567746,"name":"Jackson Elia","username":"Traptricker","avatar_template":"/user_avatar/www.chiefdelphi.com/traptricker/{size}/215403_2.png","created_at":"2025-03-25T03:02:02.282Z","cooked":"

Theres no official support for simulating limelights, but photonvision has sim support.

Do I need to have any code deployed on the robot to see its position on the limelight field ui field?
